00018 #ifndef __L4UTIL__INCLUDE__ARCH_X86__BITOPS_ARCH_H__
00019 #define __L4UTIL__INCLUDE__ARCH_X86__BITOPS_ARCH_H__
00020 
00021 /*****************************************************************************
00022  *** Implementation
00023  *****************************************************************************/
00024 
00025 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00026 
00027 /* set bit */
00028 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_SET_BIT32
00029 L4_INLINE void
00030 l4util_set_bit32(int b, volatile l4_uint32_t * dest)
00031 {
00032   __asm__ __volatile__
00033     (
00034      "btsl  %1,%0   \n\t"
00035      :
00036      :
00037      "m"   (*dest),   /* 0 mem, destination operand */
00038      "Ir"  (b)       /* 1,     bit number */
00039      :
00040      "memory", "cc"
00041      );
00042 }
00043 
00044 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_SET_BIT
00045 L4_INLINE void
00046 l4util_set_bit(int b, volatile l4_umword_t * dest)
00047 {
00048   return l4util_set_bit32(b, (volatile l4_uint32_t*)dest);
00049 }
00050 
00051 /* clear bit */
00052 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_CLEAR_BIT32
00053 L4_INLINE void
00054 l4util_clear_bit32(int b, volatile l4_uint32_t * dest)
00055 {
00056   __asm__ __volatile__
00057     (
00058      "btrl  %1,%0   \n\t"
00059      :
00060      :
00061      "m"   (*dest),   /* 0 mem, destination operand */
00062      "Ir"  (b)        /* 1,     bit number */
00063      :
00064      "memory", "cc"
00065      );
00066 }
00067 
00068 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_CLEAR_BIT
00069 L4_INLINE void
00070 l4util_clear_bit(int b, volatile l4_umword_t * dest)
00071 {
00072   return l4util_clear_bit32(b, (volatile l4_uint32_t*)dest);
00073 }
00074 
00075 /* change bit */
00076 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_COMPLEMENT_BIT
00077 L4_INLINE void
00078 l4util_complement_bit(int b, volatile l4_umword_t * dest)
00079 {
00080   __asm__ __volatile__
00081     (
00082      "btcl  %1,%0   \n\t"
00083      :
00084      :
00085      "m"   (*dest),   /* 0 mem, destination operand */
00086      "Ir"  (b)        /* 1,     bit number */
00087      :
00088      "memory", "cc"
00089      );
00090 }
00091 
00092 /* test bit */
00093 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_TEST_BIT32
00094 L4_INLINE int
00095 l4util_test_bit32(int b, const volatile l4_uint32_t * dest)
00096 {
00097   l4_int8_t bit;
00098 
00099   __asm__ __volatile__
00100     (
00101      "btl   %2,%1   \n\t"
00102      "setc  %0      \n\t"
00103      :
00104      "=q"  (bit)      /* 0,     old bit value */
00105      :
00106      "m"   (*dest),   /* 1 mem, destination operand */
00107      "Ir"  (b)        /* 2,     bit number */
00108      :
00109      "memory", "cc"
00110      );
00111 
00112   return (int)bit;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /* test bit */
00116 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_TEST_BIT
00117 L4_INLINE int
00118 l4util_test_bit(int b, const volatile l4_umword_t * dest)
00119 {
00120   return l4util_test_bit32(b, (const volatile l4_uint32_t*)dest);
00121 }
00122 
00123 /* bit test and set */
00124 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_BIT_TEST_AND_SET
00125 L4_INLINE int 
00126 l4util_bts(int b, volatile l4_umword_t * dest)
00127 {
00128   l4_int8_t bit;
00129 
00130   __asm__ __volatile__
00131     (
00132      "btsl  %2,%1   \n\t"
00133      "setc  %0      \n\t"
00134      :
00135      "=q"  (bit)      /* 0,     old bit value */
00136      :
00137      "m"   (*dest),   /* 1 mem, destination operand */
00138      "Ir"  (b)        /* 2,     bit number */
00139      :
00140      "memory", "cc"
00141      );
00142 
00143   return (int)bit;
00144 }
00145 
00146 /* bit test and reset */
00147 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_BIT_TEST_AND_RESET
00148 L4_INLINE int
00149 l4util_btr(int b, volatile l4_umword_t * dest)
00150 {
00151   l4_int8_t bit;
00152 
00153   __asm__ __volatile__
00154     (
00155      "btrl  %2,%1   \n\t"
00156      "setc  %0      \n\t"
00157      :
00158      "=q"  (bit)      /* 0,     old bit value */
00159      :
00160      "m"   (*dest),   /* 1 mem, destination operand */
00161      "Ir"  (b)        /* 2,     bit number */
00162      :
00163      "memory", "cc"
00164      );
00165 
00166   return (int)bit;
00167 }
00168 
00169 /* bit test and complement */
00170 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_BIT_TEST_AND_COMPLEMENT
00171 L4_INLINE int
00172 l4util_btc(int b, volatile l4_umword_t * dest)
00173 {
00174   l4_int8_t bit;
00175 
00176   __asm__ __volatile__
00177     (
00178      "btcl  %2,%1   \n\t"
00179      "setc  %0      \n\t"
00180      :
00181      "=q"  (bit)      /* 0,     old bit value */
00182      :
00183      "m"   (*dest),   /* 1 mem, destination operand */
00184      "Ir"  (b)        /* 2,     bit number */
00185      :
00186      "memory", "cc"
00187      );
00188 
00189   return (int)bit;
00190 }
00191 
00192 /* bit scan reverse */
00193 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_BIT_SCAN_REVERSE
00194 L4_INLINE int
00195 l4util_bsr(l4_umword_t word)
00196 {
00197   int tmp;
00198 
00199   if (EXPECT_FALSE(word == 0))
00200     return -1;
00201 
00202   __asm__ __volatile__
00203     (
00204      "bsrl %1,%0 \n\t"
00205      :
00206      "=r" (tmp)       /* 0, index of most significant set bit */
00207      :
00208      "r"  (word)      /* 1, argument */
00209      );
00210 
00211   return tmp;
00212 }
00213 
00214 /* bit scan forwad */
00215 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_BIT_SCAN_FORWARD
00216 L4_INLINE int
00217 l4util_bsf(l4_umword_t word)
00218 {
00219   int tmp;
00220 
00221   if (EXPECT_FALSE(word == 0))
00222     return -1;
00223 
00224   __asm__ __volatile__
00225     (
00226      "bsfl %1,%0 \n\t"
00227      :
00228      "=r" (tmp)       /* 0, index of least significant set bit */
00229      :
00230      "r"  (word)      /* 1, argument */
00231      );
00232 
00233   return tmp;
00234 }
00235 
00236 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_FIND_FIRST_SET_BIT
00237 L4_INLINE int
00238 l4util_find_first_set_bit(const void * dest, l4_size_t size)
00239 {
00240   l4_mword_t dummy0, dummy1, res;
00241 
00242   __asm__ __volatile__
00243     (
00244      "repe; scasl   \n\t"
00245      "jz    1f      \n\t"
00246      "leal  -4(%%edi),%%edi \n\t"
00247      "bsfl  (%%edi),%%eax \n"
00248      "1:      \n\t"
00249      "subl  %%esi,%%edi   \n\t"
00250      "shll  $3,%%edi    \n\t"
00251      "addl  %%edi,%%eax   \n\t"
00252      :
00253      "=a" (res), "=c" (dummy0), "=D" (dummy1)
00254      :
00255      "a"(0), "c" ((size+31) >> 5), "D" (dest), "S" (dest)
00256      :
00257      "cc", "memory");
00258 
00259   return res;
00260 }
00261 
00262 #define __L4UTIL_BITOPS_HAVE_ARCH_FIND_FIRST_ZERO_BIT
00263 L4_INLINE int
00264 l4util_find_first_zero_bit(const void * dest, l4_size_t size)
00265 {
00266   l4_mword_t dummy0, dummy1, dummy2, res;
00267 
00268   if (!size)
00269     return 0;
00270 
00271   __asm__ __volatile__
00272     (
00273      "repe;  scasl    \n\t"
00274      "je     1f     \n\t"
00275      "xorl   -4(%%edi),%%eax  \n\t"
00276      "subl   $4,%%edi   \n\t"
00277      "bsfl   %%eax,%%edx  \n"
00278      "1:      \n\t"
00279      "subl   %%esi,%%edi  \n\t"
00280      "shll   $3,%%edi   \n\t"
00281      "addl   %%edi,%%edx  \n\t"
00282      :
00283      "=d" (res), "=c" (dummy0), "=D" (dummy1), "=a" (dummy2)
00284      :
00285      "a" (~0), "c" ((size+31) >> 5), "d"(0), "D" (dest), "S" (dest)
00286      :
00287      "cc", "memory");
00288 
00289   return res;
00290 }
00291 
00292 EXTERN_C_END
00293 
00294 #endif /* ! __L4UTIL__INCLUDE__ARCH_X86__BITOPS_ARCH_H__ */
